info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 6:24PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTH CENTRAL HARDING AND CENTRAL UNION COUNTIES THROUGH 700 PM MDT... At 624 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles east of Chicosa Lake State Park, or 17 miles north of Mosquero, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bueyeros and Yates. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building.
